September 5-7, 2007

Applying NFPA 101®, Life Safety Code®, to the Joint Commission Statement of Conditions, San Diego, CA

Joint Commission accreditation is essential to your organization’s reputation for safety. Attend this three-day seminar on the Management of the Environment of Care chapter for hospitals and Statement of Conditions compliance based on the Life Safety Code®.

Read more

Applying NFPA 101®, Life Safety Code®, to the Joint Commission Statement of Conditions, North Charleston, SC

Joint Commission accreditation is essential to your organization’s reputation for safety. Attend this three-day seminar on the Management of the Environment of Care chapter for hospitals and Statement of Conditions compliance based on the Life Safety Code®.

September 17-21, 2007

SNFPA Professional Development Seminar Week, Cincinnati, OH

Call +1 800 344-3555 or
+1 508 895-8300.

Get top-quality instruction from the foremost industry experts on topics including the National Electrical Code, life safety, fire alarm systems, sprinkler systems and more.
